text: Truong My Lan, also known as Trương Muội, is a Vietnamese businesswoman. She is the founder and chairwoman of the board of directors of Van Thinh Phat Group. Truong My Lan's family is one of the richest families in Vietnam. Her husband is Eric Chu Nap Kee, a businessman in the real estate sector in Hong Kong. == Scandal == Van Thinh Phat borrowed up to more than 304 000 billion VND from SCB Bank and then appropriated a particularly large amount of money. == References == Category:Vietnamese people Category:Living people Category:Business people Category:1956 births
title: Trương Mỹ Lan
